channel.title: Ghosts' Town
channel.itunes:subtitle: PODCAST SUBTITLE
channel.itunes:author: MeaslyMedia
channel.itunes:summary: Chokepoint, British Columbia is a wet, unassuming city along Canada's Sunshine Coast. While few people pay the city much mind, it is a hotbed for the supernatural, and many souls find themselves lingering here well after they die. One fatefull 2009 fall evening, Stu Parker, Valorie Thorne, and Zeke Arthurs find themselves embroiled in a ghostly affair beyond their pay grade. Ghosts' Town is an actual play, horror, comedy, TTRPG podcast misusing the Monster of the Week system by Evil Hat Games.
channel.itunes:keywords: Actual Play Podcast,Horror,Comedy,Monster Of The Week
channel.description: An actual play TTRPG podcast following the supernatural mishaps of Stu Parker, Valorie Thorne, and Zeke Arthurs in the town of Chokepoint, British Columbia. It's also 2009.

item.title: Ep.4 Lunch Break | Ghosts’ Town Pt.4
item.itunes:title: Ep.4 Lunch Break | Ghosts’ Town Pt.4
item.itunes:author: MeaslyMedia
item.itunes:summary: The gang go to Meat by the Pound for artifact examination. Valorie bumps into an old "friend", Zeke has a panic attack, and Stu gets signed to a manager.
item.description:
The gang go to Meat by the Pound for artifact examination. Valorie bumps into an old "friend", Zeke has a panic attack, and Stu gets signed to a manager.

Content warnings:

  • Swearing
  • Sexual Content
  • Gore
  • Violence
  • Mental Abuse
  • Drug Use

Full vod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xFke-aGjNJ4

Sound effect sources: https://measlymedia.github.io/GhostsTown/sfx_sources.txt

item.itunes:author: MeaslyMedia
item.itunes:summary: Valorie shows off her skill behind the wheel, Stu gets a concussion, and Zeke delivers a letter.

item.title: Ep.2 Refusal of the Call | Ghosts’ Town Pt.2

item.itunes:author: MeaslyMedia
item.itunes:summary: Zeke runs away from responsibility, while Valorie and Stu meet with an untrustworthy ghost for some answers.
item.description:

item.title: Ep.1 Whatever Happened to Rutger Horse? | Ghosts’ Town Pt.1
item.itunes:title: Ep.1 Whatever Happened to Rutger Horse? | Ghosts’ Town Pt.1
item.itunes:author: MeaslyMedia
item.itunes:summary: Stu Parker makes a music/business deal in the woods, Valorie Thorne meets her new boss, and Zeke Arthurs has a normal day at work. All three find themself in the center of an unusual murder scene, made stranger since the victim was already dead.
item.description:
Stu Parker makes a music/business deal in the woods, Valorie Thorne meets her new boss, and Zeke Arthurs has a normal day at work. All three find themselves in the center of an unusual murder scene, made stranger since the victim was already dead.

Content warnings:

  • Swearing
  • Drugs
  • Murder
  • Gore
  • Mentions of Sex

Full vod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JutU7U3_yms

Complete Surf & Turf playlist (the previous campaign): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIyI69bQl5c&list=PL_BRSNtrU-0hKsJNDPr0PsjiuZfgJ3N2C
